title: A remembraunce of the wel imployed life, [and] godly end, of George Gaskoigne Esquire who deceassed at Stalmford in Lincolneshire the 7. of October. 1577. The reporte of Geor. Whetstons gent. an eye witnes of his godly and charitable end in this world.
author: Whetstone, George, 1544?-1587?
publicationStmtPublisher: For Edward Aggas, dwelling in Paules Churchyard and are there to be solde,
